text:
December 21, 1955
Dr* LaHrence B. McKune
Television Producer-Coordinator
Michigan State University-
East Lansing, Michigan
Dear Dr* McCune:
We do indeed appreciate the simulcast findings and statements as inÂ¬
cluded in your December lij. letter. We plan to use both in our Fact
Sheets and our Newsletter.
It was very thoughtful of you to take the time to tell us about it,
and contribute to the "sharing" we now so seriously need.
Sincerely,
Harry J. Skornia
Executive Director
